House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00015
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING THE AUTHORIZED EXPENSES OF CANDIDATES AND POLITICAL PARTIES DURING THE CAMPAIGN PERIOD, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7166, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Amends the Omnibus Election Code of the Philippines, as amended, to increase the allowed campaign expenditures of candidates and political parties to realistic amounts in order to accurately reflect the current cost of goods and services and promote greater voter reach and education.
